item.title: About

Weâ€™re a small, welcoming dance community in Tucson, AZ dedicated to helping you feel confident, connected, and free on the dance floor. Our focus is cumbia, with sprinkles of salsa, bachata, and social dance etiquette. No partner or experience needed â€” just curiosity and comfy shoes.
